title: "What are the dangers of using drugs to stimulate imagination and sensation?"
first_phrase: In this text, the author discusses the dangers of imagination and sensation leading one into the world of visionaries and drug abuse, respectively. The author emphasizes the importance of developing a central self-consciousness and being attentive to draw upon one's own strength, which leads to contact with the superindividual order. The last 200 tokens of the text detail how the use of wine in Dionysian orgies corresponds to this meaning and how consciousness, through this route, can pass from an individualized to a non-individualized state with potential magical consequences. The author considers the testimonies of Euripides and Pliny about Dionysian miracles resulting from orgiastic Lenee festivals, indicating the validity of these claims in principle. The text concludes by suggesting that the body's envelope loosens the grip of the soul, allowing it to be in direct contact with the central and spiritual force.
content: Sviluppandosi il processo, come cresce la luce d'intorno, contatto con l'ordine superindividuale non può avvenire piu diret tamente per il solo slancio dello spirito, ma a mezzo di un certo allentamento, di una certa estasi, quale quella a cui poteva avviare l'ebrezza per vino o per sostanze analoghe. L'uso del vino nel dionisismo orgiastico corrisponde a questo significato. E se, al limite, la coscienza per tal via può passare dallo stato individuato allo stato non individuato, epperò libero, una delle conseguenze può es sere la manifestazione, anche se sporadica, di varie virtù magiche incidenti perfino sull'ordine deí fenomeni naturali. Cosí noi non escluderemmo, in via di princìpio, una certa attendibilità del'e testimonianze di Euripide e di Plinio sui « miracoli » dionisiaci pro cedenti dall'estasi nelle feste orgiastiche Lenee. Allora sperimentate, in senso letterale, che il sè regge il proprio corpo.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the use of certain substances and techniques can lead to a state of heightened consciousness and awareness, allowing for a direct connection with the spiritual realm. While there may be potential risks associated with these practices, they can also offer profound benefits and experiences that are impossible to describe. As always, caution and mindfulness should be exercised in exploring these realms.
